sentences.sentence: These charts cover Archimedes hobs, logarithmic spiral hobs as well as topping hobs.
sentences.translation: 这些图解适用于阿基米德滚刀、对数螺线滚刀、以及全切式滚刀。

sentences.sentence: Generally, standard gear hobs are only used to machine gears with the same modul, pressure Angle as hobs themselves.
sentences.translation: 在一般条件下，标准齿轮滚刀只能加工与其模数、压力角相同的同制齿轮。

sentences.sentence: This article USES Taylor Progression to figure out the approximate formula of the forming errors of Archimedes gear hobs.
sentences.translation: 利用泰勒级数导出了阿基米德齿轮滚刀造形误差的近似公式。
